transformations.name: AlterRow
transformations.description: Upsert if pk key not null

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_country',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_country.parquet']) ~> preDimCountry
preDimCountry derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Countries',
		con_iso_code = '') ~> DerivedTopLevel
DerivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		ar2_code as string,
		ar1_code as string,
		reg_description as string,
		con_id as long,
		top_code as string,
		reg_code as string,
		top_description as string,
		con_oecd as string,
		con_country_name as string,
		ar1_description as string,
		ar1_id as long,
		reg_id as long,
		con_currency_code as string,
		con_2ltr_code as string,
		ar2_id as long,
		top_id as long,
		ar2_description as string,
		con_iso_code as string,
		con_eu as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		top_code,
		top_description,
		con_iso_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCountry
